greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 0 if n is squarefree, otherwise 1 + a(n/rad(n)) where rad = A007947 (squarefree kernel).
comment: This sequence is not the same as A046660.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n)=if(n>1, vecmax(factor(n)[,2])-1, 0) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 15 2013
a066301 n = a051903 n - 1  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 23 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 01 2002
